item.title: 降息希望破灭，美国股票基金资金外流
item.description: 在截至 4 月 10 日的七天内，美国股票基金连续第二周出现资金外流，原因是在近期通胀和美国就业数据强劲之后，投资者权衡了美联储将利率维持在更高水平的可能性。【原文：U.S. equity funds witnessed outflows for a second successive week in the seven days to April 10 as investors weighed the possibility of the Federal Reserve keeping rates higher for longer following recent robust readings on inflation and U.S. payrolls.】

item.title: Roku 称超过 50 万个账户受到网络攻击影响
item.description: 流媒体服务提供商 Roku 周五表示，继今年早些时候披露 1.5 万个用户账户受到未经授权的访问后，该公司已发现第二次网络攻击，约有 57.6 万个账户受到影响。【原文：Streaming service provider Roku said on Friday it has identified a second cyber attack that impacted about 576,000 accounts, after disclosing unauthorized access of 15,000 user accounts earlier this year.】

item.title: 耐克老板计划投入 "最大 "奥运营销费用
item.description: 耐克公司高层周五表示，耐克将在本届奥运会上投入比以往任何一届奥运会都要多的资金，这家美国运动服装品牌正着手进行市场推广，希望借此重振萎靡不振的销售业绩，并与后起之秀展开竞争。【原文：Nike is spending more on this Olympics than any previous Games, top executives said on Friday, as the U.S. sportswear brand embarks on a marketing push it hopes will revive flagging sales and help compete with upstart rivals.】

item.title: 世界银行总裁在春季会议上推动内部改革
item.description: 世界银行行长阿贾伊-班加（Ajay Banga）周五表示，他计划在下周强调一系列流程改进措施，以加快发展贷款机构的贷款审批速度，提高其 16000 名员工的责任心，并吸引私人资本参与项目。【原文：World Bank President Ajay Banga said on Friday he plans to highlight a range of process improvements next week to speed up the development lender's loan approvals, improve the accountability of its 16,000 employees and attract private capital to projects.】

item.title: 美国 3 月进口价格连续第三个月上涨
item.description: 由于能源产品和食品成本上升，3 月份美国进口价格连续第三个月上涨，但基本的进口通胀压力不大。【原文：U.S. import prices increased for a third straight month in March amid rises in the costs of energy products and food, but underlying imported inflation pressures were tame.】

item.title: 欧洲与美国的经济差距确实存在，但也有其局限性
item.description: 正如欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）所坚持的那样，欧元区的通货膨胀与美国不同，但该集团仍将面临许多与其他国家相同的不利因素，从而限制物价增长放缓的幅度。【原文：Inflation in the euro zone is different to that in the United States, much as ECB President Christine Lagarde insists, but the bloc will still face many of the same headwinds as others, limiting how far price growth can slow.】

item.title: 独家报道OpenAI的Altman向包括部分微软客户在内的大型企业推介ChatGPT企业版
item.description: 与会者告诉路透社，OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）本月在旧金山、纽约和伦敦接待了数百名《财富》500 强企业的高管，他和 OpenAI 的其他高管为企业提供了人工智能服务，并在某些情况下与金融支持者微软正面交锋。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Sam Altman has hosted hundreds of Fortune 500 company executives in San Francisco, New York and London this month where he and other OpenAI executives pitched AI services for corporate use, going head to head in some cases with financial backer Microsoft, attendees told Reuters.】

item.title: 员工遣散费和存款保险成本上升导致花旗利润下降
item.description: 花旗集团第一季度利润下降，原因是该公司为下岗员工支付了更多的遣散费，并留出资金补充政府存款保险基金。【原文：Citigroup's profit fell in the first quarter as it spent more on severance payments for laid-off employees and set aside money to refill a government deposit insurance fund.】

item.title: 苹果驳回英国有关应用程序商店收费诉讼的申请败诉
item.description: 周五，苹果公司在伦敦代表 1500 多家应用程序开发商就其应用程序商店收费问题提起了一场价值近 10 亿美元的大规模诉讼，但苹果公司最终败诉。【原文：Apple on Friday lost a bid to throw out a mass lawsuit valued at just under $1 billion, brought in London on behalf of more than 1,500 app developers over its App Store fees.】

item.title: 阿根廷政府（和一个机器人）说通货膨胀正在缓解。购物者并不确定
item.description: 阿根廷政府乐观地认为，其为世界上通货膨胀率最高的国家之一降温的措施正在发挥作用。然而，购物者并不完全相信。【原文：Argentina's government is bullish that its measures to cool one of the world's highest inflation rates are working. Shoppers, however, aren't yet fully convinced.】

item.title: 中国加强股市交易和上市监管
item.description: 中国证券监管机构周五发布了加强公司上市、退市和量化交易监管的细则草案，以改善股市和保护投资者利益。【原文：China's securities regulator issued draft rules to strengthen regulations on company listings, delistings and quant trading on Friday, in a move to improve the stock market and protect investor interests.】

item.title: 富国银行利润缩水逾 7%，原因是利息收入减少
item.description: 由于富国银行第一季度从客户利息支出中获得的收入减少，其利润下降了 7% 以上，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 3%。【原文：Wells Fargo's profit fell more than 7% as it earned less from customer interest payments in the first quarter, sending its shares down 3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 摩根大通因利息收入增长而利润上升
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）周五表示，由于利息收入增加，该公司第一季度的利润有所增长。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's profit rose in the first quarter as it earned more from interest payments, the bank said on Friday.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车品牌 Hyper 表示将于 2026 年在其汽车中使用全固态电池
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商广汽爱安旗下 Hyper 品牌周五表示，已完成全固态电池的研发工作，该电池将于 2026 年首次用于 Hyper 汽车。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker GAC Aion's Hyper brand said on Friday it has finished R&D on all-solid-state batteries that will be first used in Hyper cars in 2026.】

item.title: 独家报道美联储主席柯林斯预计今年将降息两次
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）预计今年将有几次降息，因为人们预计通胀率要恢复到目标水平可能还需要一些时间。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins is eyeing a couple of interest rate cuts this year amid expectations it could still take some time to get inflation back to targeted levels.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）就部分福特 SUV 因燃油泄漏召回展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周五表示，由于担心燃料泄漏可能导致火灾隐患，该局正在对召回42652辆福特SUV展开调查。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Friday it was opening an investigation into the recall of 42,652 Ford SUVs over concerns of a fuel leak that could lead to fire hazards.】

item.title: 洞察：如果特朗普获胜，他计划将华尔街从 "繁重的监管 "中解放出来
item.description: 根据对公开文件的审查和对与前总统结盟的人士的采访，特朗普的第二任白宫将寻求大幅削减美国金融监管机构的权力。【原文：A second Trump White House would seek to sharply reduce the power of U.S. financial regulators, according to a review of public documents and interviews with people allied with the former president.】

item.title: 从五张图表看特朗普传媒股票的狂飙突进
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）的混乱首秀吸引了市场参与者的目光，其股价一路狂飙，公司估值飙升至 90 亿美元，随后暴跌。【原文：The chaotic debut of Trump Media & Technology Group has captivated market participants, as its shares went on a wild ride in which the company's valuation soared to $9 billion before tumbling.】

item.title: 随着储能技术的蓬勃发展，加州电池厂跻身世界最大电池厂之列
item.description: 洛杉矶附近的一座大型电池厂今年晚些时候投产后，将成为世界上最大的电池厂之一，有望在夏季高峰期支撑起加州的电网，并帮助加州实现雄心勃勃的气候目标。【原文：A major battery plant near Los Angeles will be among the largest in the world when it comes online later this year, promising to shore up California's power grid during the peak summer season and help the state a meet ambitious climate goals.】

item.title: 早间新闻视线转向财报、中国贸易不佳、中东局势紧张
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 贝莱德第一季度利润因手续费收入增加而增长
item.description: 周五，贝莱德公布第一季度利润增长，原因是全球股市反弹提高了公司的投资咨询和管理费用。【原文：BlackRock posted a rise in first-quarter profit on Friday, as a rebound in global equity markets bolstered the company's investment advisory and administration fees.】

item.title: 欧盟批准 Illumina 剥离癌症测试制造商 Grail 的计划
item.description: 欧盟执行委员会周五发表声明称，批准了Illumina解除对癌症诊断测试制造商Grail的收购计划。【原文：The EU's executive Commission approved Illumina's plan to unwind its completed acquisition of cancer diagnostic test maker Grail , it said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 挪威政府表示，挪威财富基金不会投资私募股权基金
item.description: 挪威政府周五表示，世界上最大的主权财富基金--挪威1.6万亿美元的主权财富基金目前不应被允许将私募股权投资纳入其投资组合，这对该基金的管理层来说是一个挫折。【原文：Norway's $1.6 trillion sovereign wealth fund, the world's largest, should not be allowed to include private equity investments in its portfolio at this time, the government said on Friday, in a setback for the fund's management.】

item.title: 消息人士称，GQG 和 SBI 基金有意投资沃达丰 Idea 21.6 亿美元的股票出售项目
item.description: 据两位熟知内情的人士透露，投资公司 GQG Partners 和印度国家银行共同基金（State Bank India Mutual Fund）正在考虑向印度电信公司沃达丰 Idea 21.6 亿美元的股票发行项目投资总计高达 8 亿美元的资金。【原文：Investment firm GQG Partners and State Bank of India Mutual Fund are considering investing up to $800 million in total in a $2.16 billion share offering of Indian telecom firm Vodafone Idea , according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大型银行财报公布前期货持稳
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货在狭窄区间内交投，投资者在等待美国大型银行的财报，以衡量美国企业在当前高利率环境下的表现。【原文：U.S. stock index futures traded in a tight range on Friday as investors awaited earnings reports from big U.S. banks to gauge how corporate America has been faring in the current high interest rate environment.】

item.title: 中国 3 月铁矿石进口略有增长，钢材出口接近 8 年新高
item.description: 周五的海关数据显示，中国 3 月份的铁矿石进口量同比增长了约 0.5%，人们预期春节假期过后需求将回升，因为钢铁企业通常会加大生产力度。【原文：China's iron ore imports in March rose about 0.5% from a year earlier, customs data showed on Friday, amid expectations that demand will pick up after the Lunar New Year holiday break as steelmakers typically ramp up production.】

item.title: 低价 "是中国最大展会的关键词
item.description: 从下周一开始，外国买家将涌入中国最大的贸易博览会的巨大展厅，搜寻美国和欧洲政府抱怨充斥全球市场的中国商品。【原文：Foreign buyers will throng the vast halls of China's biggest trade expo from Monday, scouting for deals on Chinese goods that U.S. and European governments complain are flooding global markets.】

item.title: 中国 3 月份进出口均出现萎缩，大幅低于预期
item.description: 周五的海关数据显示，中国3月份出口大幅萎缩，进口也意外萎缩，两者均大幅低于市场预测，这凸显了决策者在努力支撑摇摇欲坠的经济复苏时所面临的艰巨任务。【原文：China's March exports contracted sharply, while imports also unexpectedly shrank, both undershooting market forecasts by big margins, customs data showed on Friday, highlighting the tough task facing policymakers as they try to bolster a shaky economic recovery.】

item.title: 美国银行报告称，美国大盘股出现 16 个月来最大单周流出量
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）称，截至本周三的一周内，美国大型股遭遇了自2022年12月以来最大的单周资金外流，交易员们担心通胀持续走高将进一步推动降息，地缘政治紧张局势也加剧了谨慎情绪。【原文：U.S. large cap stocks suffered their largest weekly outflow since December 2022 in the week to Wednesday, Bank of America said, with traders nervous that sticky inflation will push rate cuts further out and geopolitical tensions adding to caution.】

item.title: 反垄断获胜后，Epic Games 建议对谷歌应用商店进行改革
item.description: 在陪审团认定美国科技巨头滥用其作为安卓移动平台应用程序看门人的权力之后，"堡垒之夜 "视频游戏制造商Epic Games敦促加州联邦法官迫使谷歌开放其Play应用商店，以迎接更激烈的竞争。【原文：“Fortnite” video game maker Epic Games has urged a federal judge in California to force Google to open up its Play Store to greater competition after a jury found the U.S. tech giant had abused its power as a gatekeeper for apps on the Android mobile platform.】
